title: Solder wire 4T
body: Check that cable and look for bugs in the shed, they crash the machine

title: Beer with pals
body: I have a beer with my colleagues down at the pub, remember not to dance.

title: Send message
body: Remember to send message to Bob Alicer without getting it sniffed.

title: Plot against Eve
body: That person is so bothersome, I need to find a way to stop her, if I could just use TLS...

title: Encrypt message
body: Tomorrow I'll have to speak to Charlie and Eve is always in the middle, I need to encrypt my mail.

title: Launch Windows 95
body: Developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers, developers.

title: Talk to Bill
body: We're gonna dance on stage ok, well, Bill looks so weird when he does it, well, stop him, tell him, tie him, he CANNOT dance. And always, remember to go crazy ON STAGE.
